question: There have been several complaints about the reception area where visitors to your company arrive. Your manager has asked you to suggest how the reception area could be improved.Write a letter to your manager. In your letterdescribe the complaints that have been madesay why the reception area is importantsuggest how the reception area could be improved
text: I am writing to inform you about the discontinuity of my evening course.

As you are aware, I am managing my time schedule between work and the history course. Last month, I got promoted to senior project manager in my present organization and I need to take care of ongoing projects.

Last month, I tried my level best to balance my studies and work but I failed and was hospitalised due to  work pressure. The doctor advised me to give up on either work or education. Since my parents are fully dependent on me in addition to some personal commitments. I would like to discontinue my studies to proceed with my work.

Once all the issues are sorted out, I will continue my studies in near future. I am sure about the timeframe it takes. I will come and collect the course certification and other education documents which I submitted on my joining day.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
